channel.title: PvP areas and highrisk area help ~!
channel.description:
Ok i have a problem... I use zenithscape source and i noticed that fight pits and red portal in clanwars are not PvP areas, like if i go in there, i cant attack other people. How do i add PvP areas and highrisk arenas?
Fight Pits:
[img]http://img835.imageshack.us/img835/4174/screenshot1rqg.png[/img]
Red Portal at Clanwars:
[img]http://img109.imageshack.us/img109/9052/screenshot2co.png[/img]

item.title: PvP areas and highrisk area help ~!
item.dc:creator: @frozenfart frozenfart
item.description:
@frozenfart wrote:

[quote=“MooningPanda, post:4, topic:517656”][quote author=frozenfart link=topic=635919.msg4287393#msg4287393 date=1366594354]

Add a boolean.

Can you link me a guide or something please? Im really new to programming servers.
[/quote]
google.com - search ‘boolean’ or just search moparscape for a tutorial, i just read one about this exact topic for a deltascape server, and I garuntee there’s one out there for your version.[/quote]

Hey buddy I cant find any tutorials on this topic. Im trying to be humble as possible, can you link me a guide please? Or even better help me on skype. If you dont have time for me i fully understand. Thank you for the help anyways

Read full topic
item.source: PvP areas and highrisk area help ~!

item.title: PvP areas and highrisk area help ~!
item.dc:creator: @MooningPanda MooningPanda
item.description:
@MooningPanda wrote:

[quote=“frozenfart, post:3, topic:517656”][quote author=DAn0194 link=topic=635919.msg4287358#msg4287358 date=1366588857]
Add a boolean.
[/quote]

Can you link me a guide or something please? Im really new to programming servers.[/quote]
google.com - search ‘boolean’ or just search moparscape for a tutorial, i just read one about this exact topic for a deltascape server, and I garuntee there’s one out there for your version.

Read full topic
item.source: PvP areas and highrisk area help ~!
